subject: Super Bowl
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The good cheer of Bill Belichick, who coaches a team known as the most buttoned-up in the N.F.L., set a relaxed tone as the Patriots arrived in Indianapolis.
snippet: The good cheer of Bill Belichick, who coaches a team known as the most buttoned-up in the N.F.L., set a relaxed tone as the Patriots arrived in Indianapolis.
